author: CTPPS
body:
This PR is a backport of #22915, **needed for the DQM during the alignment run**, similarly to #22930 

This PR introduces the DQM for Totem vertical timing detectors, using TotemTimingDigi.
This shall be applied on top of #22930 
No conflicts are expected once #22930  is merged.
title: Totem timing DQM, backport of #22915
